ygData.subject: Re: Vampiric Embrace Fixed
ygData.msgSnippet: Is this still with the bare handed attack? or with weapons as well now? ... From:  To:  Sent: Tuesday, May 04,
ygData.messageBody:
Is this still with the "bare handed" attack? or with weapons as well now?

----- Original Message -----
From: <TkAdam@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 5:26 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Vampiric Embrace Fixed


> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 5/4/99 6:13:16 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
> shdwpanther@... writes:
>
> > "9) Vampiric Embrace has been modified from it's original design
to
> > improve game play.
>
> It now will randomly "flare" with a lifetap effect when you attack. at
18th
> level, I tap for 28 points with it. It is not every attack, but randomly
> goes off as you swing.
>
> Adam
